title: Strategies for Enhancing Learning Engagement in Blended Learning Environments: Strengthening Teaching Presence Through Formative Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and demonstrated social leadership experience
context.additional_context: Development and application of blended learning strategies to enhance learner engagement through formative assessment and instructor presence for corporate managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners improve learning engagement by over 30% using formative assessment tools in blended learning platforms
Learners advance self-regulated learning abilities by two or more levels through peer feedback systems in project-based activities
Design and apply teaching presence strategies based on perceived ease of use (PEU) of digital devices
Develop assessment systems that trigger blended learning motivation (BLM) to reduce avoidance behaviors by 50%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
